Class QueryEngine

extends java.lang.Object
    Logic for dealing with queries.
    Author:
    Jeff Schnitzer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  QueryEngine.ChunkingToRefIterator<T>
      Takes a keys-only iterable source, breaks it down into batches of a specific chunk size, and uses batch loading to load the actual values.
